attributes.review: i came from the year 3000 to see this app! from a galaxy far far away i heard the rumors and wanted to know if it was true. could this really be the app to alter mankind? is this the reason the dinosaurs died? did this app truly become the 8th wonder of the world? and i did get my answer.... i downloaded it and it sent a shock through my spinal cord. straight down to my bum hole and i unfortunately let loose feces for 48 straight hours. scientists had a revelation. the shock did kill the dinosaurs. anyway, you should really consider voting trump out and going to therapy ğŸ¥°

attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: Me Karen as a fellow trump supporter was very excited to get this app. It worked well for a few days but then it started having problems. It started with pictures of a cartoon child I believe having the name of manny pop up. Just a few pictures I didn't think much of it. It soon started spreading to the rest of my phone turning all off the apps to black and yellow! Even Facebook it went all yellow. I am completely devastated. The neighbor's dog just took a crap and didn't clean it up!!! How am I supposed to Facebook this? I will be going to the phone place whatever they call it to get it looked at. I'm the meantime I will be using my husband franks Facebook account. Definitely will be complaining to the manager of Apple for letting this happen. Very disappointed!
attributes.title: Gives phone virus
